languages.text: "Пусть Всеотец не оставит тебя в грядущих сражениях". {n}Задумчивый взгляд Ульфара прикован к телам павших.{/n}
"May the Allfather not forsake you in the battles to come." {n}Ulfar's ruminating gaze remains fixed on the bodies of the fallen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Пусть Всеотец не оставит тебя в грядущих сражениях". {n}Задумчивый взгляд Ульфара прикован к телам павших.{/n}

languages.text: “愿全父在接下来的战斗中保护你。”{n}乌尔法喃喃自语道，目光始终注视着那些尸体。{/n}
languages.original_text: "May the Allfather not forsake you in the battles to come." {n}Ulfar's ruminating gaze remains fixed on the bodies of the fallen.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “愿全父在接下来的战斗中保护你。”{n}乌尔法喃喃自语道，目光始终注视着那些尸体。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「来るべき戦いで、全知の父がそなたを見放さぬように」{n}ウルファーは思いを巡らしながら、地に伏した遺体をじっと見つめている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "May the Allfather not forsake you in the battles to come." {n}Ulfar's ruminating gaze remains fixed on the bodies of the fallen.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「来るべき戦いで、全知の父がそなたを見放さぬように」{n}ウルファーは思いを巡らしながら、地に伏した遺体をじっと見つめている。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Que el Padre de todas las cosas no os abandone en las batallas venideras». {n}La mirada meditativa de Ulfar no se aparta de los cuerpos de los caídos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "May the Allfather not forsake you in the battles to come." {n}Ulfar's ruminating gaze remains fixed on the bodies of the fallen.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Que el Padre de todas las cosas no os abandone en las batallas venideras». {n}La mirada meditativa de Ulfar no se aparta de los cuerpos de los caídos.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Puisse le Père de Tous ne pas vous abandonner dans les batailles à venir. » {n}Le regard pensif d'Ulfar reste fixé sur les dépouilles des vaincus.{/n}
languages.original_text: "May the Allfather not forsake you in the battles to come." {n}Ulfar's ruminating gaze remains fixed on the bodies of the fallen.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Puisse le Père de Tous ne pas vous abandonner dans les batailles à venir. » {n}Le regard pensif d'Ulfar reste fixé sur les dépouilles des vaincus.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Möge der Allvater Euch in kommenden Schlachten nicht verlassen." {n}Ulfars grübelnder Blick fixiert die Leichen der Gefallenen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "May the Allfather not forsake you in the battles to come." {n}Ulfar's ruminating gaze remains fixed on the bodies of the fallen.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Möge der Allvater Euch in kommenden Schlachten nicht verlassen." {n}Ulfars grübelnder Blick fixiert die Leichen der Gefallenen.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Yücebaba seni gelecekteki savaşlarında yalnız bırakmasın." {n}Ulfar'ın dalmış bakışları, yitip gitmiş kardeşlerinden ayrılmıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "May the Allfather not forsake you in the battles to come." {n}Ulfar's ruminating gaze remains fixed on the bodies of the fallen.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Yücebaba seni gelecekteki savaşlarında yalnız bırakmasın." {n}Ulfar'ın dalmış bakışları, düşmüş kardeşlerinden ayrılmıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
